name: astilbe

a plant with very small white, pink, or red flowers: Astilbes have these gorgeous long plumes of flowers that look very striking when in bloom. If you're looking for a flowering plant that will do well in the shade and thrives in moist conditions, then astilbes are a good bet. Among plants in the new garden are heuchera, ligularia, iris, astilbe, and lobelia. Synonym
false goat's beard
More examplesFewer examplesThe leaves of the astilbe are fernlike and contrast nicely with the colourful flower heads.We decided to plant astilbes, hostas, and some primulas in a rather boggy section of the garden. The common name for astilbes is false goat's beard, presumably for a resemblance to the fluffy flower heads.
